input:
Algne HTML-tootekirjeldus (sh k√µik pildid) on all. Kirjuta see ja varasemates sammudes kogutud konteksti p√µhjal √ºmber loomulikuks eestikeelseks tootekirjelduseks, s√§ilitades k√µik algsed -elemendid (sama src) ja j√§rgides √ºlaltoodud struktuuri. ORIGINAALNE_HTML_KIRJELDUS:

Precise power levels. Perfect results

Precise power levels. Perfect results The advanced technology of the StepPower Gas Hob allows you to easily set the hob‚Äôs flame controls between levels 1 through 9, so you can deliver exact and consistent heat to pots and pans, without having to bend down to see the flame.

StepPower. For precise heat

StepPower. For precise heat Experience precision on the hob with StepPower controls. And produce consistently delicious dishes. The heat can be set at levels 1 to 9, with each ascending increment offering more power. Because exact settings mean outstanding results.

Speed Burners - accurate heat for faster performance

Speed Burners - accurate heat for faster performance The design of the Speed Burners in this AEG gas hob allows for the flames to directly target the bottom of the pan, providing quicker heat and greater efficiency. These high-speed burners get you cooking up to 20% faster.

Get powerful heat, with the Powerful Wok

Get powerful heat, with the Powerful Wok Experience fuller flavour in your favourite dishes with this Powerful Wok. It generates intense, direct heat ‚Äì ideal for searing seafood and locking in mouth-watering stir-fry flavours. Wok cooking mastered.

Add a premium look to your hob, with Cast Iron Grid pan supports

Add a premium look to your hob, with Cast Iron Grid pan supports Add a professional look to your kitchen with durable and premium cast iron pan supports. Continuous cast iron pan supports let you slide your cookware easily and safely without having to lift them for a seamless cooking experience

Integrated Ignition - quick access to powerful heat for cooking

Integrated Ignition - quick access to powerful heat for cooking With Integrated Ignition, all you have to do is gently turn and press the knob, to effortlessly and comfortably spark a flame from the hob.
